Reference

All functions

adjustStrings()

Adjust the size of character strings

aggregateCol()

Aggregate columns

applyString()

Apply a function on character strings

assignClass2df()

Assign a class to columns

assignIds()

Assign an id to a list of characters or factors

categorize()

Assign categories

dfTemplate() dfTemplateMatch()

Create a data frame from scratch or based on one or two data frames

duplicateRow() duplicateCol()

Duplicates elements of a data frame

findThem()

Find values in a given vector

gaussianShape()

Flexible bell-shaped function

getDigits()

Extract digits from a character vector

getExtension() getFilename() getName() getBasename() getLocation() getDetails()

Extract file name, extension and basename ofrom a path.é

keepWords() keepLetters() keepInitials() wordCount()

Keep a selection of words or letters

logistic() logistic2()

Logistic functions

loremIpsum()

Lorem ipsum.

meanAlong()

Compute the mean along a vector

msgInfo() msgError() msgSuccess() msgWarning()

Pre-formatted message functions

multiMatch()

Multiple match

packagesUsed()

Get a data frame of package and their installed version.

readYamlHeader()

Reads YAML headers

scaleWithin()

Scale a set of values

seqRg() seqCol() seqRow()

Generate a regular sequence based on the range of a vector

setColClass()

Set class of data frames columns

signifSymbols()

A simple function to associated p-values with symbols

squaretize()

Makes a data frame or a matrix square

stopwatch() timer()

Timer and Stopwatch

tblDown()

Write data frames in a document

whichIs()

Search values or patterns in a vector
